programme.title: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
programme.desc: After years of working as a mutant mercenary, Logan lives a quiet life with his girlfriend, Kayla. However, a figure from his past brutally assassinates Kayla, compelling Logan to seek vengeance.

programme.title: The Monkey King 2
programme.desc: The Monkey King decides to accompany Tang Sanzang, a monk who aims to retrieve sacred scriptures. On their way, they encounter an evil demon who seeks immortality at great cost to Sanzang.

programme.title: KunLun Battle
programme.desc: After the Kunlun gatekeeper is betrayed and ruined by his own people, his son joins forces with a shark man to fight their way back into Kunlun and avenge his father.

programme.title: Conan The Barbarian
programme.desc: Conan, a Cimmerian warrior, seeks revenge against a warlord who attacked his village and killed his father. However, he soon realises that his kingdom faces a far greater threat.

programme.title: The Shallows
programme.desc: A woman journeys to a secluded beach following her mother's death and while surfing, she gets attacked by a great white shark, which leaves her stranded on a rock 200 yards away from the shore.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Clark learns about the source of his abilities and his real home when he enters a Kryptonian ship in the Artic. However, an old enemy follows him to Earth in search of a codex and brings destruction.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Two young brothers find themselves transported into the depths of space while playing a board game. They try their best to find their way back to Earth.

programme.title: Zootopia
programme.desc: Judy Hopps and Nick Wilde team up to uncover the mystery behind fourteen missing predators. They end up finding out that the conspiracy is larger than it seems.

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: Simba, a young lion prince, flees his kingdom after the murder of his father, Mufasa. Years later, a chance encounter with Nala, a lioness, compels him to return and take back what is rightfully his.

programme.title: X-Men
programme.desc: Magneto kidnaps Marie, a young mutant, with the intention of using her powers to destroy humanity. However, the X-Men and Wolverine team up to save her and stop Magneto.
